author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Recessed shower light tips…I set the hole saw diameter to the light’s template dimension. Btw, these lights come with a paper template that can be used to trace the dimension on the drywall. Then I use the adjustable hole cutter with the debris shield to catch the drywall dust. This is just one way to do it, I’ve also used a simple jab saw. For more detailed tips and step-by-step tutorials visit https://homerepairtutor.com 🔥#recessedlighting #showerremodel #bathroomremodel #diy #homerepairtutor
title: Recessed Shower Light Tips - #shorts #recessedlighting #homerepairtutor
